title: Live News Platform
description: Interactive news platform using NLP and APIs to visualize real-time keywords with clickable word clouds
fullDescription: A dynamic, interactive news platform that uses NLP, web scraping, and APIs to visualize real-time keywords from trending headlines through clickable word clouds linked to related articles and videos.
modalContent:
Status: NJBDA 2025 – Presented

Technologies: Python, NLP, TextBlob, REST APIs, Streamlit, WordCloud, JSON, Web Scraping

GitHub: ajayrajsingh2003/live-news-platform


Key Achievements:

  • Processed 300+ articles in real-time using advanced NLP techniques
  • 60% reduction in content delivery time through automated API-to-UI pipeline
  • Enhanced accessibility for underserved users through intuitive visual discovery
  • Integrated NYT and Bing Search APIs for comprehensive news coverage
  • Built interactive word clouds enabling efficient content exploration

title: AQI Routing Maps
description: Health-focused navigation using Azure Maps providing pollution-aware routes for respiratory patients
fullDescription: Health-focused navigation system using Azure Maps API to provide pollution-aware routes for respiratory patients, integrating real-time air quality and weather data.
modalContent:
Status: NJBDA 2025 – Presented | First Place Winner - Data Science Showcase

Technologies: Azure Maps API, Python, REST APIs, Real-time Data Processing, Geospatial Analysis

GitHub: ajayrajsingh2003/aqi-routing-maps


Key Achievements:

  • 60% reduction in data preparation time through automated environmental data ingestion
  • Demonstrated health risk reduction in 100+ route simulations
  • Real-time integration of AQI and weather data for safer commuting
  • Custom algorithm prioritizing routes with lower pollution levels
  • Supports sustainable urban mobility planning

title: Metaheuristic Optimization
description: PSO, ACO, and Hybrid optimization for breast cancer diagnosis with improved accuracy
fullDescription: Metaheuristic Optimization for Logistic Regression using PSO, ACO, and Hybrid ACO+GridSearchCV to optimize the regularization parameter C for breast cancer diagnosis.
modalContent:
Application: Breast Cancer Diagnosis

Technologies: Python, Scikit-learn, PSO, ACO, Hybrid ACO+GridSearchCV, Logistic Regression

GitHub: ajayrajsingh2003/Optimization-with-Metaheuristic-Optimization


Research Achievements:

  • 15% improvement in prediction accuracy over traditional methods
  • 20% reduction in model training time
  • 30% reduction in error rates on Breast Cancer Wisconsin dataset
  • Comparative analysis of PSO, ACO, and Hybrid optimization approaches
  • Optimized regularization parameter C for improved model stability

title: Text Summarization
description: Comparative analysis of BART, T5, and PEGASUS models for abstractive summarization
fullDescription: Comprehensive comparison of state-of-the-art abstractive summarization models evaluating execution time, memory usage, and summary quality.
modalContent:
Technologies: BART, T5, PEGASUS, Python, NLP, Cosine Similarity, BERT, Word2Vec

GitHub: ajayrajsingh2003/Text-Summarization


Key Findings:

  • Evaluated BART, T5, and PEGASUS models for abstractive summarization
  • Analyzed execution time and memory usage trade-offs
  • Used Cosine Similarity, BERT, and Word2Vec for quality assessment
  • Provided guidelines for model selection in real-world applications
  • Highlighted performance trade-offs for different use cases

title: Heart Disease Dashboard
description: Award-winning Tableau visualization on CDC's Heart Disease Dataset (Data Storyteller Award)
fullDescription: Award-winning Tableau dashboard built on the CDC's 'Indicator of Heart Disease Dataset' 2022, showcasing advanced data visualization and storytelling techniques.
modalContent:
Award: Data Storyteller Award Winner

Technologies: Tableau, Data Visualization, CDC Dataset, Statistical Analysis

GitHub: ajayrajsingh2003/data-storyteller-award-dashboard


Key Features:

  • Interactive visualizations for heart disease indicators
  • Statistical analysis of CDC's 2022 dataset
  • Data-driven insights for health outcomes prediction
  • Advanced Tableau techniques for effective storytelling
  • Recognized for excellence in data visualization

title: ETL Pipeline Automation
description: Automated PySpark ETL with Airflow reducing manual effort by 40% at Pavane Solutions
fullDescription: Enterprise-grade ETL pipeline automation project implementing scalable batch and real-time data processing workflows using PySpark and Apache Airflow.
modalContent:
Company: Pavane Solutions Inc.

Technologies: PySpark, Apache Airflow, AWS (S3, Redshift, Glue), Terraform, CloudWatch


Key Achievements:

  • 35% improvement in data processing throughput
  • 40% reduction in manual errors through automation
  • 25% reduction in operational costs via AWS optimization
  • Implemented Infrastructure as Code using Terraform
  • Built reusable data ingestion frameworks
  • Developed robust data quality monitoring systems
